content.question: If peak electricity use occurs around <math alttext="2 p m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>p.m.</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the Los Angeles area and avoiding brownouts is more important to the installers of the <math alttext="P V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PV</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> panels than annual energy output, which of the following <math alttext="P V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PV</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> panel systems would be best to use in the area?

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
